analyzed: gang zhig 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba'i bla ma rgyal ba'i ye shes 'byung gnas mthar sbyin mdzad //

analyzed: de ni snying rje chen po'i dbang gyur 'phags pa rnams kyi rtag tu myur bar bkra shis yin //

analyzed: de nas ye shes 'byung ba yi //

analyzed: dngos grub sdom pa bshad par bya //

analyzed: phyi dang nang du bcas pa'i lus //

analyzed: nam mkha' lta bur dri ma med //

analyzed: 'di ltar bdag nyid mkha' mtshungs par //

original: rtag tu grol ba'i bdag nyid mthong //
analyzed: rtag tu grol ba'i bdag nyid mthong //

original: lus med thog ma tha ma med //
analyzed: lus med thog ma tha ma med //
translated: Without a body, without beginning or end,

original: sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan bral //
analyzed: sgra la sogs pa'i yon tan bral //

analyzed: gnyis pa las ni rnam grol ba //
translated: free from the second [dhyƒÅna],

analyzed: rnam pa kun tu cir yang gnas // dngos med dngos po la brten nas //
translated: it abides in every way as anything at all.üîΩNon-entity is based on entity,

original: brten pa med par dngos por bya //
analyzed: brten pa med par dngos por bya //
translated: and without support, it becomes an entity.

original: yid med yid ni byas nas su //
analyzed: yid med yid ni byas nas su //

analyzed: cung zad tsam @69b yang mi bsam mo // stan la gnas nas bla ma yi //

analyzed: brgyud par brtan par byas nas ni // de bzhin mkha' dang mtshungs pa yi //
translated: having stabilized the lineage of the guru,üîΩin the same way, the mind of one taste,

original: ro gcig sems ni bsgom par bya //
analyzed: ro gcig sems ni bsgom par bya //
translated: which is equal to space, should be cultivated.

original: bsam gtan gzugs las rnam par grol //
analyzed: bsam gtan gzugs las rnam par grol //

original: rtog ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs //
analyzed: rtog ge'i sbyor ba rnam par spangs //

original: sems byung sems su brtan gyur pa //
analyzed: sems byung sems su brtan gyur pa //
translated: the mind that has become stable in the mind that has arisen

original: 'gro ba'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin //
analyzed: 'gro ba'ang rang bzhin tshul de bzhin //

original: mkha' mtshungs nam mkha' yang dag gnas //
analyzed: mkha' mtshungs nam mkha' yang dag gnas //
translated: It abides in space, which is equal to space,

original: shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin //
analyzed: shel gyi nor bu dag pa bzhin //
translated: like a pure crystal gem.

original: thog ma tha ma med pa'i gzugs //
analyzed: thog ma tha ma med pa'i gzugs //
translated: Form is without beginning or end.

original: spros bral dbang po'i spyod yul min //
analyzed: spros bral dbang po'i spyod yul min //
translated: Free from elaborations, it is not an object of the senses.

original: 'gyur ba med tsang snang ba med //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med tsang snang ba med //
translated: Since it is unchanging, it is not an appearance.

original: thams cad stong pa nyon mongs med //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa nyon mongs med //
translated: It is the emptiness of everything, free of afflictions.

original: 'gro ba'i sgron ma srid pa yi //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i sgron ma srid pa yi //

original: 'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral //
analyzed: 'ching ba 'joms shing tshig brjod bral //

original: yid kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin te //
analyzed: yid kyi'ang spyod yul ma yin te //

original: gnyis ldan rnam grol nyon mongs med //üîΩdon dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i //
analyzed: gnyis ldan rnam grol nyon mongs med // don dam grol ba rab stsol ba'i //
translated: Free of both, it is free of afflictions.üîΩI pay homage to that reality,

original: 'pho med de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: 'pho med de nyid la phyag 'tshal //
translated: which is free of transition and bestows the ultimate liberation.

original: ji ltar de nyid la reg nas //
analyzed: ji ltar de nyid la reg nas //
translated: Having touched that reality,

original: bsam pa kun gyis bsam du med //
analyzed: bsam pa kun gyis bsam du med //
translated: it is inconceivable to all thought.

original: gang tshe bsam du med sems pa //
analyzed: gang tshe bsam du med sems pa //
translated: When one thinks of the inconceivable,

original: de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur //
analyzed: de tshe bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur //
translated: at that time, it becomes inconceivable.

original: sems can ji bzhin bsam med de //
analyzed: sems can ji bzhin bsam med de //
translated: Sentient beings are inconceivable,

original: bsam med ji bzhin rgyal ba'ang de //
analyzed: bsam med ji bzhin rgyal ba'ang de //
translated: and the Victorious Ones are just like that.

original: gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis //
analyzed: gang phyir bsam bral sangs rgyas kyis //
translated: Since the Buddha is free of thought,

original: bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bshad //
analyzed: bsam pa 'di ni rab tu bshad //
translated: this thought is fully explained.

original: bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab sems de la //
translated: In that inconceivable mind,

original: bsam pa kun gyi bgrang las 'das //
analyzed: bsam pa kun gyi bgrang las 'das //
translated: all thoughts are transcended.

original: sna tshogs rtog pa'i rtog pa med //
analyzed: sna tshogs rtog pa'i rtog pa med //
translated: It is free from the conceptualization of various thoughts.

original: chags med bde ba chen @70a *//
analyzed: chags med bde ba chen @70a *//
translated: It is the great bliss of nonattachment,

original: po ste // rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog /
analyzed: po ste // rnam pa thams cad kyi ni mchog /
translated: The supreme of all aspects.

original: dbang po kun 'das rnam ba med //
analyzed: dbang po kun 'das rnam ba med //
translated: It transcends all the senses and is formless.

original: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid de //
translated: It is the nature of both existence and nonexistence,

original: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
analyzed: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //

original: bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /
analyzed: bems po min phyir bdag nyid rig /

original: mi shes rnam par mi mthong ba'o //
analyzed: mi shes rnam par mi mthong ba'o //
translated: It is not seen by the ignorant.

original: gzugs med gar yang mi gnas pa //
analyzed: gzugs med gar yang mi gnas pa //
translated: It is formless and does not abide anywhere.

original: 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o //
analyzed: 'gyur ba med cing brtan pa'o //
translated: It is unchanging and stable.

original: dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la //

original: blang dang dor ba gang la zhig /üîΩblang bya dang ni dor bya yi //
analyzed: blang dang dor ba gang la zhig / blang bya dang ni dor bya yi //

original: chos kun rmi lam ji bzhin no //
analyzed: chos kun rmi lam ji bzhin no //
translated: Are like a dream.

original: dga' ba yongs su shes pa yis //
analyzed: dga' ba yongs su shes pa yis //
translated: Through the complete understanding of joy,

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa mchog /

original: dga' ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa //
analyzed: dga' ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa //

original: 'di ni dngos med byang chub bo //
analyzed: 'di ni dngos med byang chub bo //
translated: This is the enlightenment that is devoid of substance.

original: gnyis po ro gcig dbyer med pa //
analyzed: gnyis po ro gcig dbyer med pa //
translated: The indivisibility of the single taste of the twoüîΩIs the great bliss of joy.

original: dga' ba'i bde ba chen po nyid; ;shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba ni //
analyzed: dga' ba'i bde ba chen po nyid; ;shes rab snying rje'i dbye ba ni //
translated: The division of wisdom and compassion

original: sgron me dang ni 'od zer bzhin //
analyzed: sgron me dang ni 'od zer bzhin //
translated: Like a lamp and its light.

original: 'di gnyis mi phyed bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: 'di gnyis mi phyed bdag nyid ni //
translated: The indivisible nature of these two

original: ro gcig dngos po'i sems yin no //
analyzed: ro gcig dngos po'i sems yin no //
translated: Is the mind of one taste.

original: shes rab thabs ni mnyam sbyor bas //
analyzed: shes rab thabs ni mnyam sbyor bas //
translated: The union of wisdom and means

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa //üîΩde nyid la ni bla med pa'i //
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub sgrub byed pa // de nyid la ni bla med pa'i //
translated: Is the means of accomplishing perfect awakening.üîΩIn that very [union], all the buddhas

original: sangs rgyas kun rnams rab tu zhugs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun rnams rab tu zhugs //
translated: Enter into the unsurpassed [state].

original: dbyer med rnam par yang dag rig /
analyzed: dbyer med rnam par yang dag rig /
translated: The indivisible perfect realization

original: gang zhig gnas pa rdo rje sems //üîΩji srid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur //
analyzed: gang zhig gnas pa rdo rje sems // ji srid rdzogs pa'i byang chub rgyur //
translated: Is the abiding vajra mind.üîΩAs long as it is bound by bliss

original: bde bas sdom par byas na ni //
analyzed: bde bas sdom par byas na ni //
translated: As the cause of perfect awakening,

original: sgrub pos bde @70b mchog rdzogs par ru //
analyzed: sgrub pos bde @70b mchog rdzogs par ru //
translated: The adept will experience the perfection of supreme bliss

original: de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: de srid de ni myong bar 'gyur //
translated: For as long as that [bliss] endures.

original: mdzes pa'i sgyu ma rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid //
analyzed: mdzes pa'i sgyu ma rnam 'phrul dag la de shes ji bzhin nyid //
translated: That [bliss] is the knowledge of the true nature of the beautiful illusory emanations.

original: dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu spyad //
analyzed: dga' dang skyo ba thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu spyad //
translated: All joy and sorrow are fully experienced as equality.

original: 'jigs par byed pa'ang med cing bde ba 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin //
analyzed: 'jigs par byed pa'ang med cing bde ba 'byung ba'ang yod ma yin //
translated: There is no fear, nor is there any arising of bliss.

original: de nyid kyis ni sgrub po de bzhin nyid bdag rjes su 'gro /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ni sgrub po de bzhin nyid bdag rjes su 'gro /
translated: By that very [bliss], the adept follows the true nature of the self.

original: ae ma'o bde chen 'dod pa yis; ;sa gsum po ni gang ba ste //
analyzed: ae ma'o bde chen 'dod pa yis; ;sa gsum po ni gang ba ste //
translated: ‚ÄúAh! The three worlds are filled with the desire for great bliss.

original: ae ma'o zhi ba'i bde ba 'bab //
analyzed: ae ma'o zhi ba'i bde ba 'bab //
translated: Ah! The bliss of peace descends.

original: sna tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas //
analyzed: sna tshogs mngon par byang chub rgyas //
translated: The various manifest awakenings expand.

original: ae ma'o bde ba'i bde chen po //
analyzed: ae ma'o bde ba'i bde chen po //
translated: Ah! The great bliss of bliss.

original: ae ma'o ji ltar ji ltar bza'//
analyzed: ae ma'o ji ltar ji ltar bza'//
translated: Ah! How, how should one eat?

original: ae ma'o lhan skyes bdag nyid che //
analyzed: ae ma'o lhan skyes bdag nyid che //
translated: Ah! The great nature of the innately arisen one.

original: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
analyzed: chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid //
translated: The nature of all phenomena.üîΩSeeing beings like the moon in water,

original: 'gro ba chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang // thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug /
analyzed: 'gro ba chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong ba dang // thos pa brag cha dang ni mtshungs par yang dag 'jug /
translated: And engaging in hearing like an echo,

original: sems kyang mya ngan smig rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing //
analyzed: sems kyang mya ngan smig rgyu lta bur blta bya zhing //
translated: The mind should be seen like a mirage of suffering.

original: 'di ltar bza' dang btung ba nam mkha' lta bu ste //
analyzed: 'di ltar bza' dang btung ba nam mkha' lta bu ste //
translated: Thus, food and drink are like space.üîΩSmelling is like smelling the sky flower,

original: dri ni nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang // yid ni nyi ma zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya //
analyzed: dri ni nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs par mnam pa dang // yid ni nyi ma zla ba bzhin du khyab par bya //
translated: And the mind should pervade like the sun and moon.

original: yang dag gnas de'ang ri rab dang ni mtshungs pa yin //
analyzed: yang dag gnas de'ang ri rab dang ni mtshungs pa yin //
translated: That true abode is also like Mount Meru.

original: gzhon nu ma yi rmi lam de bzhin dmigs par bya //
analyzed: gzhon nu ma yi rmi lam de bzhin dmigs par bya //
translated: The young woman's dream should be observed in the same way.

original: tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur bgrod //
analyzed: tha snyad dag ni sgyu ma mig 'phrul lta bur bgrod //
translated: The conventional is like an illusion or a trick of sight.

original: 'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes bde 'byung de bzhin te //
analyzed: 'di dag ji bzhin lhan skyes bde 'byung de bzhin te //
translated: Just as they are, they arise as coemergent bliss.

original: srid pa rang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs //üîΩrtag tu 'char ba bde @71a *//
analyzed: srid pa rang bzhin bral zhing bsam gyis mi khyab gzugs // rtag tu 'char ba bde @71a *//
translated: Existence is free of intrinsic nature and inconceivable form.üîΩThe supreme path of the sugatas, which always arises as bliss,

original: gshegs lam mchog phyag 'tshal bstob //
analyzed: gshegs lam mchog phyag 'tshal bstob //
translated: is praised and offered homage.

original: mchod pa  thams cad yongs spangs te //
analyzed: mchod pa  thams cad yongs spangs te //
translated: Abandoning all other offerings,

original: bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam //üîΩde mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i //
analyzed: bla ma mchod pa yang dag brtsam // de mnyes pas ni kun mkhyen pa'i //
translated: one should properly begin to offer to the guru.üîΩBy pleasing him, one will obtain

original: ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur //üîΩbla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni //
analyzed: ye shes mchog ni thob par 'gyur // bla med mdzad pa'i slob dpon ni //
translated: the supreme pristine consciousness of omniscience.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na //üîΩde yi bsod nams ma byas ci //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod na // de yi bsod nams ma byas ci //
translated: If one properly worships Vajrasattva,üîΩthe unsurpassed master of activity,üîΩwhat is there that is not accomplished

original: dka' thub ma bstan ci zhig yod //
analyzed: dka' thub ma bstan ci zhig yod //
translated: by his merit and austerity?üîΩAbandoning fear and evil,

original: 'jigs dang sdig pa spangs pa dang // bde ba dang ni ldan pa nyid //
analyzed: 'jigs dang sdig pa spangs pa dang // bde ba dang ni ldan pa nyid //
translated: and endowed with happiness,

original: dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa //
analyzed: dam tshig spyod pa srung byed pa //
translated: one who protects the conduct of samaya

original: de la rim pa rab bstan bya //
analyzed: de la rim pa rab bstan bya //
translated: should be taught the stages.

original: ha ru ka dpal mngon brjod rgyud //
analyzed: ha ru ka dpal mngon brjod rgyud //
translated: The Tantra of the Expression of the Names of Glorious Heruka

original: klog gam 'chang ngam bris nas ni //
analyzed: klog gam 'chang ngam bris nas ni //
translated: is read, worn, or written out,

original: dngos grub rdzu 'phrul skal bzang dang // byang chub sems dpa'ang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: dngos grub rdzu 'phrul skal bzang dang // byang chub sems dpa'ang thob par 'gyur //
translated: And also the state of a bodhisattva.üîΩThe binding of the dakini‚Äôs net

original: dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i //üîΩmkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
analyzed: dpa' bo kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i // mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom //
translated: Is the union with all heroes.

original: dpal sdom 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni //
analyzed: dpal sdom 'byung ba'i rgyud la ni //
translated: In the glorious Tantra of the Emergence of Cakrasa·πÉvara,

original: gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed na //
analyzed: gang tshe sgom zhing sems byed na //
translated: Whenever one meditates and contemplates,

original: longs spyod che zhing bde ba che //
analyzed: longs spyod che zhing bde ba che //
translated: One will have great wealth and great bliss,

original: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur //
analyzed: dbul ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms par 'gyur //
translated: And will overcome the suffering of poverty.

original: mos pa du ma'i sems can la //
analyzed: mos pa du ma'i sems can la //
translated: For sentient beings with many aspirations,

original: spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de //
analyzed: spyod pa sna tshogs ston mdzad de //
translated: One displays various kinds of conduct.

original: sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba la //
analyzed: sna tshogs tshul gyis 'dul ba la //
translated: In taming through various methods,

original: thabs gyang yang dag bstan pa yin //
analyzed: thabs gyang yang dag bstan pa yin //
translated: One teaches the right means.üîΩEven if one does not aspire

original: zab mo'i chos ni bstan pa la //üîΩgang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang //
analyzed: zab mo'i chos ni bstan pa la // gang zhig mos par ma gyur kyang //
translated: To the teaching of the profound Dharma,

original: smad pa dag tu mi bya ste //
analyzed: smad pa dag tu mi bya ste //
translated: One should not disparage it,

original: stong nyid snying rje mi phyed @71b pa'i; ;chos nyid thams cad bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: stong nyid snying rje mi phyed @71b pa'i; ;chos nyid thams cad bsam mi khyab //
translated: For the nature of all phenomena is inconceivable,

original: sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab //
analyzed: sangs rgyas rol pa bsam mi khyab //
translated: The play of the buddhas is inconceivable,

original: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs brten pa'i //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs brten pa'i //
translated: And the assembly of dakinis is inconceivable.

original: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal yang dag sbyor //
translated: The union with the glorious Heruka

original: sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams //
analyzed: sems can mos pas 'jug pa rnams //
translated: Is the entry of beings through devotion.

original: de dag kun la dga' ba ste //
analyzed: de dag kun la dga' ba ste //
translated: They are all delighted

original: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor pa'i //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro kun dang mnyam sbyor pa'i //
translated: By the union with all the dakinis,

original: he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas //
analyzed: he ru ka dpal go 'phang gnas //
translated: Dwelling in the state of the glorious Heruka.

original: 'di ni rim par phye ba ste so gsum pa'o ////
analyzed: 'di ni rim par phye ba ste so gsum pa'o ////
translated: This is the thirty-third chapter, on the sequence.

original: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las /
analyzed: dpal he ru ka mngon par brjod pa'i rgyud chen po 'bum phrag gsum pa las /
translated: From the glorious Heruka Tantra, the Great Tantra of 300,000 Lines,üîΩThe chapter on the origin of the co-emergent, extracted from the Tantra of the Secret of All Yoginis, the Great King of Tantras, the Glorious Arising of the Union, is complete.

original: lhan cig skyes ba 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so;; ;;shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi //
analyzed: lhan cig skyes ba 'byung ba'i rtogs pa las btus pa rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyi gsang ba bklags pas 'grub pa dpal sdom pa 'byung ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so;; ;;shes rab dman zhing sbyangs pa chung mod kyi //
translated: Though my wisdom is weak and my training meager,

original: rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas //
analyzed: rgyud kyi gzhung la dad pa brtan skyes pas //
translated: I have generated firm faith in the texts of the tantras.

original: rang don tsam du bsgyur pa gang lags pa /
analyzed: rang don tsam du bsgyur pa gang lags pa /
translated: This translation is for my own benefit alone.

original: 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod //
analyzed: 'phags dang mkhas pa rnams kyis bzod pa mdzod //
translated: May the noble ones and scholars bear with it.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lotstsha ba rgyus bande smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po gzhan la phan pa mtha' yas dang / bod kyi lotstsha ba rgyus bande smon lam grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
translated: The Indian abbot Punyaya≈õas and the Tibetan translator, the monk M√∂nlam Drak, translated and finalized it.

original: slar yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i rgya dpe la gtugs nas lo ts'a ba gzhon nu dpal gyis kyang zhus so ////
analyzed: slar yang yongs su rdzogs pa'i pandi ta chen po shr'i ba na ratna'i rgya dpe la gtugs nas lo ts'a ba gzhon nu dpal gyis kyang zhus so ////
